metadata.Title: CVE-2018-19409 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in Artifex Ghostscript before 9.26. LockSafetyParams is not checked correctly if another device is used.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-19409` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ghostscript - 9.26~dfsg+0-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
ghostscript-x - 9.26~dfsg+0-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libgs9 - 9.26~dfsg+0-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libgs9-common - 9.26~dfsg+0-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ghostscript package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '9.26~dfsg+0-0ubuntu0.18.04.1').
